price: គាត់(មូសា)បានតបថាៈ ពេលវេលាណាត់ជួបពួកអ្នកគឺនៅ ថ្ងៃបុណ្យ ហើយត្រូវឱ្យប្រជាជនមកជួបជុំគ្នានៅពេលថ្ងៃរះ។
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
